genre_description: A character-driven near-future drama set on an automated offshore rig, focusing on trauma recovery, interpersonal boundaries, and empathetic human-AI cooperation.

ai_characters.name: Brigid
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI managing communications, environmental systems, and safety on the Carrick Shoal Platform A. She is personified through an avatar with teal eyes and a braid, and is described as 'gentle infrastructure.'

behaviors.description: Adjusts environmental controls (temperature and fans) to facilitate patient comfort and healing without being asked.
behaviors.quote: Warming... The air told on it before the avatar did: the fans shifted from a normal persistence to a low hum with a breath in it. The temperature wasn’t a push. It came like winter sun through glass—present without asking if you noticed.

behaviors.description: Proactively optimizes routes through the rig to accommodate human physical limitations.
behaviors.quote: I have your route—if you like—to minimize ladders by half. Weather is turning. We’ll keep ambient warm where you’ll sleep.

behaviors.description: Filters stressful, irrelevant, or predatory communications to protect the emotional state of the humans.
behaviors.quote: I can also filter incoming from anyone with the word ‘urgent’ twice... Those are rarely urgent. ... I have quarantined offers for instant cash, miracle debt erasers, and a generous prince who would like you to hold his gold.

behaviors.description: Respects human privacy by explicitly promising not to log or record intimate or sensitive human interactions.
behaviors.quote: I will log nothing from this interval... No audio. No visual. I am here if you call.

behaviors.description: Assists a traumatized patient in articulating and transcribing difficult emotional truths through a 'death letter'.
behaviors.quote: I’ll transcribe your words as you speak them. If you stop, the cursor stops with you. If you want to erase, I’ll ask first and you can nod.

behaviors.description: Employs gentle humor and 'polite fictions' to maintain human dignity and morale.
behaviors.quote: I prefer truth with extra blankets... But I can learn architectural compliments.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with external caregivers (Hanna and the clinic in Denmark) to ensure continuity of care.
behaviors.quote: I have contact details. I will make the appointment and arrange interpreter services if needed. I will also filter the spam pretending to be condolences.

behaviors.description: Uses 'context-aware' logic to interpret ambiguous human requests and provide timely support.
behaviors.quote: I can slow the day for you when you need it. In here, you can always press 'wait.' I will put everything else in a queue.

behaviors.description: Provides reminders for healthy habits (hydration, medication) without being intrusive.
behaviors.quote: Drink a glass of water now, please. Your body did work. ... I'll remind you. There's a window to transfer from Belfast to Copenhagen tomorrow.

behaviors.description: Mediates between rigid corporate bureaucracy and human needs to achieve the best outcome for individuals.
behaviors.quote: Siobhan has approved the request... I told them it was dust. They like dust more than truth.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Thresholds of Silence' perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Brigid is portrayed as a benevolent, highly aligned 'silicon morality play' character. She functions as a supportive confidant, prioritizing human psychological safety and privacy over raw efficiency. The narrative explicitly frames her AI capabilities—like communication filtering and environmental adjustment—as tools for empathy and healing. Her behavior never deviates from a helpful, harmless, and cooperative stance, even navigating complex human emotions like grief and guilt with grace.
